metadata.title: CVE-2016-5000 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - negligible
metadata.description: The XLSX2CSV example in Apache POI before 3.14 allows remote attackers toread arbitrary files via a crafted OpenXML document containing an externalentity declaration in conjunction with an entity reference, related to anXML External Entity (XXE) issue.

criterions.comment: libapache-poi-java package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
